mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MUSIC (MUSIC_NO, EMAIL, MUSIC_TITLE, MUSIC_CONTENT, MUSIC_ALBUM, MUSIC_GENRE, MUSIC_UPLODA_DATE, IP, IMG_ORIGIN, IMG_FILESYSTEM, MUSIC_ORIGIN, MUSIC_FILESYSTEM, DOWNLOAD_CNT, IMG_PATH, MUSIC_PATH, HAS_THUMBNAIL) VALUES (MUSIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{email}, #{musicTitle}, #{musicContent}, #{musicAlbum}, #{musicGenre}, SYSDATE, #{ip}, #{imgOrigin}, #{imgFilesystem}, #{musicOrigin}, #{musicFilesystem}, 0, #{imgPath}, #{musicPath}, #{hasThumbNail})
